attributes.value:
Instructions:
Prepare the Pan:

Grease a 9x13-inch baking dish with butter or nonstick spray.
Melt the Butter and Marshmallows:

In a large saucepan, melt the butter over low heat.
Add the marshmallows and stir until completely melted.
Add Food Coloring:

Divide the melted marshmallow mixture into three separate bowls.
Add a few drops of different food coloring to each bowl (green, orange, purple) and stir until the color is evenly distributed.
Combine with Cereal:

Add 2 cups of crispy rice cereal to each bowl and stir until well coated.
Press into Pan:

Press each colored mixture into the prepared pan, creating layers if desired.
Let cool and set.
Decorate:

Once set, cut the treats into squares or fun shapes using cookie cutters.
Melt chocolate chips in a microwave-safe bowl until smooth.
Use the melted chocolate to attach candy eyes and other decorations to create monster faces.
Serve:

Arrange the decorated Rice Krispie treats on a platter and serve.
